thread.section_title: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brushy Mountain Bee Farm | brushymountainbeefarm.com
thread.title: Barbara
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by Barbara

author: Barbara
title: Barbara
text:
Very prompt service. When one item was back-ordered, there was the potential to change my shipping rate if I wanted items shipped separately. I was given the option to wait a few days longer so everything could be shipped at the same time, and thus save on shipping costs. Excellent and fast customer service.
All items were of excellent quality
